title: Apostle Islands National Lakeshore: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions         Bayfield Headquarters Photo by Damon Panek, NPS  Bayfield Headquarters The headquarters visitor center is one block off Wisconsin Route 13 in the city of Bayfield.  Click here to be brought to a Google map.          Little Sand Bay Visitor Center Photo by Damon Panek, NPS  Little Sand Bay Visitor Center The visitor center and fishery exhibit at Little Sand Bay is accessible by road or lake access, 13 miles north of Bayfield.  Click here to be brought to a Google map.          Meyers Beach Stairway Photo by Damon Panek, NPS  Meyers Beach Meyers Beach Road, off Highway 13 about 5 miles east of Cornucopia, offers lake access and a trailhead.   Click here to be brought to a Google map.        Northern Great Lakes Visitor Center   Northern Great Lakes Visitor Center Entertain yourself at the Northern Great Lakes Visitor Center for an hour or an afternoon! Our one-of-a-kind four-season facility welcomes explorers of all ages.  Click here to be brought to a Google map.         Kayak Outfitters Safety Briefing NPS  Getting to the Islands Island locations are only accessible by water. Follow this link for information on getting to the islands. More... Campsite GPS coordinates (62.8kb pdf)
